verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Blessing, problems, triumphs, tragedies
All are designed to bring us to the Lord
Laughing, crying, good times, misery
All are designed to bring us to the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord works all things together for good
For those whom He loves He shows His design
Til we all see Jesus as the center of our lives
And bring everything to His throne

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Struggles, freedom, failures, victories
Are all designed to bring us to the Lord
Friendships, heartaches, farewells, longing hearts
All are designed to bring us the Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Yes it's all ordained by the One Who Reigns
Everything is all designed to lead us to the Lord
